page.title: 02THE TARGET ROUNDABOUT
page.content: The{Target roundabout}has subways running through it. When standing in the open centre of the subway complex the tunnels look like a littered beehive. This litter is mainly the remains of broken glass bottles which crunch underfoot;ripped,bent beer cans and cigarette stubs,some still alight.The tunnels are painted with spray cans and thick felt-tips, advertising local names and popular mottos.On the sides of the subway there are bushes with dry sharp thorns. This open area is flanked by a one way roundabout. Over the motorway there are two bridges. Next to one of them is a footbridge which can fit two people abreast. In{1985}people are worried about going into the subway because of sinister happenings.In the tunnels the noise is quite deafening.
